title: Ruthless. Heartless! Loveless.
description: Ruthless. Heartless! Loveless. is a collection of poetry about heartbreak, sadness, grief, illness and eventually finding love again. Written in the process of healing, during the worst times and in the process of being diagnosed with an illness, its captivating power will make you unable to put it down.The book is divided into four strategically placed sections.
author: Holly Star
